channel.title: Common Collaboration and Learning Environment
channel.description: The UCLA Common Collaboration and Learning Environment (CCLE) supports instruction and research within a common digital environment for faculty, students and staff.

item.title: Login
item.description:
Guest Access - access to publicly viewable sites
Special Case Login - only if you have been assigned a special case ID
Getting an error after a successful login? Your Logon ID might not be working properly.
